articles.description: A shock double-elimination this week sees just four of the teams make it through. As the competition builds towards Sunday’s  House Rules grand final, contestants Kimmy, Rhi, Kayne, Aimee and Lenore down tools to reflect on their time on the show.
articles.content:
Victoria's Kayne and Aimee worked well together.
